author: Rebecca Klar
title: All Iowa voters to get absentee ballot request form
description: Every registered voter in Iowa will be sent an absentee ballot request form ahead of the state's June 2 primary, the Iowa Secretary of State's Office announced Tuesday....
content:
Every registered voter in Iowa will be sent an absentee ballot request form ahead of the states June 2 primary, the Iowa Secretary of States Office announced Tuesday. 
"My office will be mailing an absentee ballot request form to every registered voter in Io… [+1213 chars]
